code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import{persistStore}from'redux-persist';import logger from'redux-logger';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import{composeWithDevTools}from'redux-devtools-extension';import rootReducer from'./root-reducer';var middleware=[logger,thunk];var composeEnhancers=composeWithDevTools({trace:true,traceLimit:25});export var store=createStore(rootReducer,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middleware)));export var persistor=persistStore(store);
